bibl.title: [Michigan Papyri. Volume XI.] Papyri from the Michigan Collection.
bibl.seg: Shelton John C., [Michigan Papyri. Volume XI.] Papyri from the Michigan Collection. (American Studies in Papyrology. 9.)
Toronto, A.M. Hakkert, 1971, 4°, xvi-132 pp. et IX pll.

C.R. par Jean Bingen, ChrEg 47 (1972) Nos 93-94, pp. 308-311. - Zbigniew Borkowski, JJurP 18 (1974) pp. 272-280 (concerne aussi P. Mich. X). - Dieter Hennig, Gnomon 46 (1974) pp. 992-994. - José O'Callaghan, StPap 11 (1972) pp. 125-126. - John R. Rea, JEA 60 (1974) pp. 294-297. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 89 (1972) pp. 400-406 (concerne aussi P. Mich. X). - J. David Thomas, JRS 62 (1972) p. 190. - Edmond Van 't Dack, BibO 30 (1973) pp. 240-243.
